hanzi-su-wiki:
凱

Значения

Победа, триумф

Мнемоника

Победа, триумф, когда стучат барабаны 豆, а столы 几 ломятся от яств. Слева наверху — не гора, а рука.

Варианты

凯

kǎi
triumphant; triumph, victory
торжествующий; триумф, победа

    • 几 [ jǐ ] small table; how many; a few, some
heisig_chinese_memo: After triumphant fighting in a battle the troops have some mountain man beans and talk about how many enemies they were able to take down. &nbsp
Ru_Radicals: 并, 几 (стол), 口 (рот), 山 (гора), 豆 (боб)
Kanshudo_mnemonic: what! (豈) a table (几) is your victory song?
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: You would never know it but mountain snakes like to sit at a small table and play poker for hours until one of them is triumphant. This is how they choose who gets the mating rights.
humanum_full_description_en:
from " a few ", " Qi " tone to indicate the victorious army played music. "Chen Shu‧Jinxi Wang Shuwen Biography": "( Shuwen) joined the kings of Jin, Qin, etc., and was listed in the temple."

" Kay " also means harmony and joy. "Book of Rites‧Biaoji": "The Poetry" says: "The gentleman of Kai is the parents of the people." Kai is strong to teach it, and the younger is to say it is safe." Kong Yingdashu: "Kai, Le Ye; brother, Yi Ye."

" Kay " can also mean to chop and chop. "Kingben Popular Novels: Grinding Jade Guanyin": "The County King's Road: "But I am not stubborn and teaches people to catch this man. When I get a military order, I now have a knife!""
humanum_short_description_en: From the " few ", " Qi " tone to indicate the victorious army played music.
humanum_full_description:
從「几」，「豈」聲，表示軍隊得勝所奏的樂曲。《陳書‧晉熙王叔文傳》：「（叔文）隨晉王、秦王等獻凱而入，列於廟廷。」

　　「凱」也表示和樂、歡樂。《禮記‧表記》：「《詩》云：『凱弟君子，民之父母。』凱以強教之，弟以說安之。」孔穎達疏：「凱，樂也；弟，易也。」

　　「凱」還可表示砍、斬。《京本通俗小說‧碾玉觀音》：「郡王道：『卻不叵耐，教人捉這漢，等我取過軍令狀來，如今凱了一刀！』」
humanum_short_description: 從「几」，「豈」聲，表示軍隊得勝所奏的樂曲。

Chinese Definition:
Kanshudo mnemonic:what! (豈) a table (几) is your victory song?
Chinese: After triumphant fighting in a battle the troops have some mountain man beans and talk about how many enemies they were able to take down.  
Meaning: triumphant
Hanzi: 凯
Story: You would never know it but mountain snakes like to sit at a small table and play poker for hours until one of them is triumphant. This is how they choose who gets the mating rights.
Kind: traditional

從「 几 」，「 豈 」聲，表示軍隊得勝所奏的樂曲。《陳書‧晉熙王叔文傳》：「（叔文）隨晉王、秦王等獻凱而入，列於廟廷。」 「 凱 」也表示和樂、歡樂。《禮記‧表記》：「《詩》云：『凱弟君子，民之父母。』凱以強教之，弟以說安之。」孔穎達疏：「凱，樂也；弟，易也。」 「 凱 」還可表示砍、斬。《京本通俗小說‧碾玉觀音》：「郡王道：『卻不叵耐，教人捉這漢，等我取過軍令狀來，如今凱了一刀！』」
from " a few", " Qi" tone to indicate the victorious army played music. "Chen Shu‧Jinxi Wang Shuwen Biography": "( Shuwen) joined the kings of Jin, Qin, etc., and was listed in the temple." " Kay" also means harmony and joy. "Book of Rites‧Biaoji": "The Poetry" says: "The gentleman of Kai is the parents of the people." Kai is strong to teach it, and the younger is to say it is safe." Kong Yingdashu: "Kai, Le Ye; brother, Yi Ye." " Kay" can also mean to chop and chop. "Kingben Popular Novels: Grinding Jade Guanyin": "The County King's Road: "But I am not stubborn and teaches people to catch this man. When I get a military order, I now have a knife!""

凱字的基本解释

凱
kǎi
见“凯”。

凱字的汉语字典释义

[①]［kǎi］
［《廣韻》苦亥切，上海，溪。］
“凯1”的繁体字。
(1)军队得胜所奏的乐曲。
(2)和乐；欢乐。
(3)温和。参见“凱風”。
(4)砍，斩。
(5)通“愷”。指德才兼备的人。
(6)通“剴”。切实。参见“凱切”。
(7)姓。

凱字的康熙字典解释

【子集下】【几字部】　凱； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页134第31
【唐韻】苦亥切【集韻】【正韻】可亥切，?同愷。【玉篇】凱，樂也。或作愷。又善也。【史記·五帝本紀】高陽氏有才子八人，謂之八愷。又【正韻】和也。南風謂之凱風。【詩·衞風】凱風自南。又通作闓。【史記·司馬相如傳】昆蟲凱澤。【前漢·司馬相如傳】昆蟲闓澤。【註】師古曰：闓讀曰凱。文穎曰：闓樂也。

凱字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形

暂无。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［kǎi］
["Guangyun" bitterly cut, Shanghai, Xi. ]
Traditional characters for "凯1".
(1) The music played by the army in victory.
(2) Harmony; joy.
(3) Mild. See "Kaifeng".
(4) Cut, cut.
(5) Through "Kai". Refers to a person who has both ability and political integrity.
(6) Through "剀". practical. See "Kaiche".
(7) Last name.

Good too. 【Historical Records·Benji of the Five Emperors】The Gaoyang family had eight talents, which is called the Eight Kais. And [Zheng Yun] and Ye. The south wind is called the Kaifeng.
